entry.title: Two Teens Critically Injured in Crash Near Sutherlin
entry.summary: Two 17-year-old girls were critically injured in a crash near Sutherlin on March 26 after their vehicle collided with a truck towing an excavator. The teens were transferred to Portland hospitals. The truck driver sustained minor injuries and cooperated with the investigation.

entry.title: Lookingglass Brewery in Winston For Sale
entry.summary: Lookingglass Brewery in Winston is up for sale. Founded in 2015 by Mark and Lydia Nunnelee, the $1.9M listing includes the business and building. It’s the only brewery between Roseburg and Grants Pass. Learn more at lgbrewpub.com.

entry.title: A Community Tradition at Risk: Help Save Winston's 4th of July Fireworks
entry.summary: Winston’s 50-year 4th of July fireworks tradition may not happen this year. With $25,000 still needed and little support so far, the event is at risk of being canceled. Community donations and volunteers are urgently needed to keep this celebration alive. Let’s not lose the 50th before it begins.
